title: In the world of children's publishing, making a memorable first impression is crucial. Blueberry Bagel Publishing Company, known for its enchanting children's books, was ready to make a splash with their upcoming title.
desc: But their website wasn't quite ready for the big reveal. They needed a captivating 'Coming Soon' page to keep the excitement brewing. That's when they turned to us at Onix for help. So, letâ€™s consider how we did brand mascot animation development below.
